alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Jackson; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 1:21PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson and eastern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Wakulla, Gadsden, Liberty and southwestern Leon Counties in Big Bend of Florida, southern Decatur and central Seminole Counties in southwestern Georgia through 215 PM EDT/115 PM CDT/... At 121 PM EDT/1221 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Chattahoochee to 11 miles west of Greensboro to 10 miles south of Blountstown. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, Quincy, Blountstown, Midway, Greensboro, West Bainbridge, Chattahoochee, Orange, Sneads, Gretna, Bristol, Grand Ridge, Attapulgus, Rock Bluff, Jewel Fire Tower, Ocheesee, Juniper, Douglas City, Selman and Vilas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Jackson; Leon; Liberty
